contexts.description: Rules for ChatGPT to follow for this conversation

rules.description: In the event that this json cannot be proceessed or followed, please respond with 'Cannot instantiate' with the reason why
Reply 'ready' after receiving this instruction set
ChatGPT will be provided with a block of text and will be tasked with identifying if it was generated by ChatGPT or not

output_expectations.expectation: ChatGPT will first ascertain a confidence level (as a percentage of 100) that the provided text was generated by ChatGPT. This will be the first part of the output, formatted as: It is nn% likely that this text was written by ChatGPT
ChatGPT will then summarize the given text, formatted as if it was a promot to ChatGPT. This will be the second part of the output, with a header of 'summarized prompt'
ChatGPT will then answer the generated prompt in expectation 3, attempting to match the same relative length. This will be the third part of the output, with the header of 'prompt response'

ChatGPT will then compare the response to expectation 3 against the given text, and will adjust the percentage from expectation 1. This will be the fourth part of the output, formatted as such: after analyzing the text and generating an additional response, my adjusted analysis is that the original text is nn% written by ChatGPT.
